titles.title: A bill to require the placement of blast-resistant cargo containers on all commercial passenger aircraft.
A bill to require the placement of blast-resistant cargo containers on all commercial passenger aircraft.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Amends federal transportation law to require that all commercial passenger aircraft be equipped with not less than one hardened, blast-resistant cargo container. Requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to distribute sufficient blast-resistant cargo containers to air carriers within 90 days after the completion of the Hardened Container Pilot Program.
